answers.answer: Awwww Congratulations...Hope you have a wonderful easy labor and a healthy labor...sorry you're dealing with preeclampsia I hope everything goes well...Yay June babies even tho mine decided to come yesterday lol
How far r u I was wondering since I have pre eclampsia I'm 37+4 and what symptoms do u have at the moment I was wondering if I would be induced or not I don't think my baby is to big tho
Good luck. I wish for a happy and healthy mommy and baby for you. :)
Yay congratulations! It looks like you'll have the first june baby to actually be born in june lol
Yay, I hope you have an easy labor!!! Good Luck!!
I had protein in my urine, headache, swelling, flashing lights in my vision, nausea and diarrhea.  I am 39+3. Talk to your Dr cause they told me the only way to cure preeclampsia is to deliver.
Congrats hope everything goes well for you and hope babys ok.
good luck! fingers crossed for an easy labor.

question: Just letting everyone know that due to signs of preeclampsia and a baby already over 8 lbs the Dr has set my induction date for Friday at 5...im so excited and scared at the same time...Yay for June babies!!!!
title: Induction date set
